DescriptionData.Title: Alan Sloane Flash Gloves w/ Elastic Wrist
DescriptionData.Description: Flash gloves are a colored costume glove that is a little thinner, and runs a little smaller than the regular nylon gloves with snap. One size fits most small to medium hands. Available in several colors.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Nylon costume gloves perfect for parades or for clown costumes
Elastic wrist for a snug fit
Runs a little smaller than the regular nylon gloves so they fit most small to medium hands
Sold in pairs only
